verses.text: \w Let|strong="G2233"\w* as \w many|strong="G3745"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w yoke|strong="G2218"\w* \w count|strong="G2233"\w* their \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w masters|strong="G1203"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add his\add* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w* \w be|strong="G0987"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they that \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w believing|strong="G4103"\w* \w masters|strong="G1203"\w*, let \w them|strong="G2706"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w despise|strong="G2706"\w* \add them\add*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w do|strong="G1398"\w* \add them\add* \w service|strong="G1398"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w partakers|strong="G0482"\w* of the \w benefit|strong="G2108"\w*. These \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* teach \w otherwise|strong="G2085"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w consent|strong="G4334"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w wholesome|strong="G5198"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*, \add even\add* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* words of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w* which is according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*;

He is \w proud|strong="G5187"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1987"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w doting|strong="G3552"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w questions|strong="G2214"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* strifes of \w words|strong="G3055"\w*, \w where|strong="G3739"\w*\w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w cometh|strong="G1096"\w* \w envy|strong="G5355"\w*, \w strife|strong="G2054"\w*, \w railings|strong="G0988"\w*, \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w surmisings|strong="G5283"\w*,

Perverse \w disputings|strong="G3859"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w* of \w corrupt|strong="G1311"\w* \w minds|strong="G3563"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w destitute|strong="G0650"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, supposing \w that|strong="G3543"\w* \w gain|strong="G4200"\w* \w is|strong="G1511"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*: \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* withdraw \w thyself|strong="G0868"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w contentment|strong="G0841"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w gain|strong="G4200"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w brought|strong="G1533"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \add this\add* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \add and it is\add* \w certain|strong="G1212"\w* we \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w carry|strong="G1627"\w* \w no|strong="G3761"\w*\w thing|strong="G5100"\w* \w out|strong="G1627"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w food|strong="G1305"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w raiment|strong="G4629"\w* let us \w be|strong="G0714"\w* \w therewith|strong="G5125"\w* \w content|strong="G0714"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* they that \w will|strong="G1014"\w* be \w rich|strong="G4147"\w* \w fall|strong="G1706"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w temptation|strong="G3986"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w snare|strong="G3803"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add into\add* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w foolish|strong="G0453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hurtful|strong="G0983"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w drown|strong="G1036"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w destruction|strong="G3639"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perdition|strong="G0684"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the love of \w money|strong="G5365"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w root|strong="G4491"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*: \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w while|strong="G3713"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* coveted \w after|strong="G3713"\w*, they have \w erred|strong="G0635"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pierced|strong="G4044"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w through|strong="G4044"\w* with \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w sorrows|strong="G3601"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w flee|strong="G5343"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* follow \w after|strong="G1377"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*, \w meekness|strong="G4236"\w*.

\w Fight|strong="G0075"\w* the \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w fight|strong="G0073"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, lay hold \w on|strong="G1949"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w where|strong="G3739"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* thou \w art|strong="G2564"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hast \w professed|strong="G3670"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w profession|strong="G3671"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*.

I \w give|strong="G3853"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w charge|strong="G3853"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, who \w quickeneth|strong="G2227"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add before\add* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w who|strong="G3140"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w Pontius|strong="G4194"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w witnessed|strong="G3140"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w confession|strong="G3671"\w*;

\w That|strong="G5083"\w* \w thou|strong="G4571"\w* \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \add this\add* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* without \w spot|strong="G0784"\w*, \w unrebukeable|strong="G0423"\w*, \w until|strong="G3360"\w* the \w appearing|strong="G2015"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* in \w his|strong="G2398"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w* he shall \w shew|strong="G1166"\w*, \add who is\add* the \w blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \w Potentate|strong="G1413"\w*, the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of \w kings|strong="G0936"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* of \w lords|strong="G2961"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G2192"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w immortality|strong="G0110"\w*, dwelling \w in|strong="G3611"\w* the \w light|strong="G5457"\w* which no man can approach \w unto|strong="G0676"\w*; \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* hath \w seen|strong="G1492"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w*: to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \add be\add* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G2904"\w* \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w Charge|strong="G3853"\w* them that are \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3568"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, that they \w be|strong="G5309"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w highminded|strong="G5309"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w uncertain|strong="G0083"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, who \w giveth|strong="G3930"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w richly|strong="G4146"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* enjoy;

That they do \w good|strong="G0014"\w*, that they be \w rich|strong="G4147"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, ready to \w distribute|strong="G2130"\w*, willing to \w communicate|strong="G2843"\w*;

Laying up in \w store|strong="G0597"\w* for \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* the time to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may lay hold \w on|strong="G1949"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w*, \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* that which is committed to thy \w trust|strong="G3872"\w*, \w avoiding|strong="G1624"\w* \w profane|strong="G0952"\w* \add and\add* vain \w babblings|strong="G2757"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w oppositions|strong="G0477"\w* of \w science|strong="G1108"\w* falsely so \w called|strong="G5581"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w professing|strong="G1861"\w* have \w erred|strong="G0795"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*. \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. The first to Timothy was written from Laodicea, which is the chiefest city of Phrygia Pacatiana.
